channel.title: VB Programming [resolved]
channel.description:
Well I'm no programmer so when I attempted to get some credits from this class and it resulted in a pile of silab piece of code. http://gyazo.com/3218a3e97489f613dbfa414141efb091
The problem I run into is that when there is nothing entered on the textbox and I hit the 'check results' button I get that error.
EDIT: Like I said, I'm no programmer but, could it be because its looking for an integer and its reading it as a string hence the ""?
[b]RESOLVED[/b]

To get an integer from a string, use CInt:
